names.english: drain the liver and stop emission pills
names.commonEnglish: Drain the Liver and Stop Emission Pills

actions: Drains Damp-Heat from the Liver and Gallbladder channels
Drains Damp-Heat Cools and invigorates the Blood.
With Mu Dan Pi, resolves Qi Level Stagnation leading to Heat and Heat in the Blood.
Clears Heat, cools and harmonizes the Blood, invigorates the Blood, dispels Blood Stasis and Clears Liver Fire.
Spreads Liver Qi and relieves Stagnation.
With Long Dan Cao and Zhi Zi, for Excess Heat in the Liver and/or Gallbladder channels.
Clears Heat and cools the Blood.
Tonifies the Kidneys, astringes Jing and stops diarrhea and spermatorrhea.
Calms the Liver, benefits Yin, anchors Floating Yang and prevents leakage of fluids.

symptoms: Possible voiding of urine mixed with Jing
Voiding of dark-colored, turbid, hot urine
A bitter taste in the mouth
